item.title: Pamela add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I stood still, vision blurring, and in that moment, I heard my heart break. It was a small, clean sound, like the snapping of a flower's stem." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Anthony Trollope
item.description: "To have her meals, and her daily walk, and her fill of novels, and to be left alone, was all that she asked of the gods." -- Anthony Trollope

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "There is only one page left to write on. I will fill it with words of only one syllable. I love. I have loved. I will love." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Itâ€™s dark now and I am very tired. I love you, always. Time is nothing." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "We laugh and laugh, and nothing can ever be sad, no one can be lost, or dead, or far away: right now we are here, and nothing can mar our perfection, or steal the joy of this perfect moment." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Pamela add a quote by Anna Lee Waldo
item.description: "Do what comes into your life and do it well... Be polite without groveling. If you are ever afraid of anything, do not deny it, but behave as if you feared nothing." -- Anna Lee Waldo
